data.title: Various Artists - "In the Mix 90s Hits" Compilation Album
data.text:
"In the Mix 90s Hits" - Various Artists

Compilation Album

U2 Related Content:

"Even Better Than the Real Thing" (The Perfecto Mix - Mix Edit) - U2 (03:36)

Full Track Listing:

CD One:

Wrong (Todd Terry Remix) – Everything But the Girl

Two Can Play That Game (K Klass Mix) – Bobby Brown

Show Me Luv (Stonebridge Club Mix) – Robin S

Higher State of Consciousness (Original Tweekin’ Mix) – Josh Wink

Is There Anybody Out There (Extended) – Bassheads

The Bomb (These Sounds Fall Into My Mind) (12-INch Mix) – Kenny “Dope” Presents the Bucketheads

Renaissance (M People Master Mix) – M People

Let Me Show You (Club Mix) – K-Klass

Chant (Full Intention Mix) – Gusto

Such a Good Feeling (Inspirational Delight Mix) – Brothers in Rhythm

Go (Woodtick Mix) – Moby

Jazz It Up (Erick “More” Club Mix) – Reel 2 Reel

Ain’t No Love, Ain’t No Use (Original Mix) – Sub Sub feat. Melanie Williams

Give it Up (Batacuda Refrescante Mix) – The Goodmen

Latin Thing (Latin Intruder Mix) – Latin Thung

U Sure Do (Guest List Mix) – Strike

Don’t Stop Moving (Original 12-Inch Mix) – Livin’ Joy

Cry India (Ark Anthem Mix) – Umboza

Everybody’s Free (Casino Ressurection Mix) – Rozalla

Disc Two:

Blurred (Original Mix) – Pianoman

Girls And Boys (Dancing Divaz Mix) – Hed Boys

Let the Music Lift You Up (Full On Vocal Extended Mix) – Loveland featuring Rachel McFarlane

Even Better Than the Real Thing (Perfecto Mix) – U2

Playing with Knives (Quadrant Mix) – Bizarre Inc

Always Something There to Remind Me (Tooley Street Mix) – Tin Tin Out feat. Espirtu

Son of a Gun (JX & Red Jerry Flog the Horse Mix) – JX

Your Loving Arms (Sound Factory Vocal) – Bille Ray Martin

The Key, The Secret (Dancing Divaz Club Mix) – U.C.C

I Believe (Red Jerry Mix) – Happy Clappers

Sweet Harmony (Liquid 95 Mix) – Liquid

Rockin’ For Myself (Ultimate Vocal Mix) – Motiv 8

Waterfall (Original Netherlands Mix) – Atlantic Ocean

Disco 2000 (Motiv 8 Discoid Mix) – Pulp

Let Me Be Your Fantasy (Dancing Divaz Club Mix) – Baby D

Swamp Thing (Grid Southern Comfort Mix) – The Grid

Born Slippy (Nuxx Mix) – Underworld

Children (Dream Version) – Robert Miles

Background Information

This is one of those mixed CDs that many tend to dislike, as this is a full mix, where one song becomes another and the barriers between them is not clear. This isn’t a clean edit of “Even Better Than the Real Thing”, but rather a mix of the song which starts 26.5 seconds before the end of the previous track, and continues for the full length of the fourth track on the album. The U2 portion of the mix ends at the end of the fourth track and does not continue into the fifth track.

The mix here is The Perfecto Mix of “Even Better Than the Real Thing” but it has been altered slightly and runs a bit faster than other releases of the mix. The mix starts at the end of the track before it and the vocal actually starts with the third track and finishes on the fourth, with the word “Higher” being strung across both tracks. This mix uses the full Perfecto Mix and not the Radio Edit for this mix.

The mix is a two disc set, remixed by Simon Walsh and Charlie Brook. Brook used to mix for Pete Tong as well, and this compilation was done in conjunction with the BBC. This release was issued in the UK, on cassette and CD.

Liner Notes

Concept and compilation by Mark Goodier and Ashley Abram. All tracks mixed by Simon Walsh and Charlie Brook at Wise Buddah.
